# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.VMX property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

Virtual Machine Extensions. A value of true indicates the processor supports this technology.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: VMX
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean

```csharp
public static IPropertyKey VMX { get; }
```
